card.text: {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Map AVA
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Bird AVA
card.text: Flying

card.name: Defense of Reedsey
card.text: (As a Skirmish enters, choose an opponent to protect it. All other players may attack it. Creatures attacking a Skirmish have flying.) When this Battle enters, put a vigilance counter on target creature or Vehicle. When this Battle is defeated, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Skipping Class
card.text: (As a Skirmish enters, choose an opponent to protect it. All other players may attack it. Creatures attacking a Skirmish have flying.) Flash When this Battle enters, return up to one target creature you control to its owner's hand. When this Battle is defeated, you may return up to one target creature you don't control to its owner's hand.

card.name: A Sabotaging of Hope
card.text: (As a Skirmish enters, choose an opponent to protect it. All other players may attack it. Creatures attacking a Skirmish have flying.) When this Battle enters, target opponent discards a card. When this Battle is defeated, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Ninth Dawn Public Relations
card.text: (As a Skirmish enters, choose an opponent to protect it. All other players may attack it. Creatures attacking a Skirmish have flying.) When this Battle enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. When this Battle is defeated, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Test of Courage
card.text: (As a Skirmish enters, choose an opponent to protect it. All other players may attack it. Creatures attacking a Skirmish have flying.) When this Battle enters, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. When this Battle is defeated, you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Break with the Past
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand. Destroy all artifacts with mana value equal to or less than the mana value of the card revealed to cast this spell.

card.name: Treasure AVA
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Minibomb AVA
card.text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: This artifact deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Construct AVA
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: This artifact deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Pilot Soldier AVA
card.text: This creature crews Vehicles as if its power were 2 greater.

card.name: Dragon Spirit AVA

card.name: Zuun Warrenguard
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, choose one — • You gain hexproof until end of turn. • Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Ropehold Scout
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, choose one — • Put a flying counter on it. • Surveil 2.

card.name: Gersauld's Assassin
card.text: Whenever this becomes blocked by a creature that isn't a Zombie or Skeleton, you may pay {B}. If you do, choose one — • This creature gains indestructible until end of turn. • This creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Wide-bore Warning
card.text: This spell deals 3 damage to target tapped creature. If that creature is attacking and you control a Rabbit, you may destroy that creature instead.

card.name: Distracting Saboteur
card.text: Activated abilities of creature and/or planeswalker permanents and cards cost an additional {2} to activate.

card.name: Aluki Exile
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If it's the third time, search your library for a permanent card with mana value 5 or less, reveal it and put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Marla, Gearheart Druid
card.text: Ward {1} Whenever a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, that player instead puts that card onto the bottom of their library and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Marla's Last Stand
card.text: (As a Skirmish enters, choose an opponent to protect it. All other players may attack it. Creatures attacking a Skirmish have flying.) When this Battle enters, if you cast it, exile target nonland permanent. When this Battle is defeated, you draw a card, then gain life equal to the exiled card's mana value.

card.name: Salvaging Company
card.text: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, exile up to one target artifact card with mana value 3 or less from that player's graveyard. You may cast that artifact from exile this turn, and spend mana as if it were any color to do so.

card.name: Foolhardy Tinkerer
card.text: When this enters, create a tapped Treasure token. Tap X artifacts you control: This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
